thread.title: Thom Yorke and Nigel Godrich to DJ Rag & Bone New York Fashion Week Party
thread.title_full: Thom Yorke and Nigel Godrich to DJ Rag & Bone New York Fashion Week Party

author: Sam Sodomsky
title: Thom Yorke and Nigel Godrich to DJ Rag & Bone New York Fashion Week Party

organizations.name: dj rag & bone new york fashion week party yorke
dj rag & bone new york fashion week party
rag & bone ’s new york fashion week party

text:
Thom Yorke and Nigel Godrich to DJ Rag & Bone New York Fashion Week Party Yorke and Godrich will help celebrate the brand's 15th anniversary and new season tomorrow night Photo by David Wolff - Patrick/Redferns via Getty Images 
Thom Yorke and Nigel Godrich will DJ at Rag & Bone ’s New York Fashion Week party and exhibition tomorrow night in Manhattan, sources tell Pitchfork. The event is a celebration of the brand’s 15th anniversary and also serves as the launch of their Fall / Winter 2017 collection. Yorke and Godrich have a long history with Rag & Bone . Most recently, Yorke provided the soundtrack for their 2017 Spring/Summer collection, premiering a new song “Coloured Candy.” 
Revisit Rag&Bone's 2016 Spring/Summer collection video, featuring the Yorke track "Villain":
